amendment.description: Amendment transfers to the Department of the Interior land to be held in trust for the benefit of the Muscogee (Creek) Nation, after the Muscogee (Creek) Nation has paid to the Army Corps of Engineers fair market value of the land transferred.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Mica.
